product-info.opis: Rdeča barva za lase Subrina Charm vsebuje hranljivo in negovalno avokadovo olje, bogato z vitamini in esencialnimi maščobnimi kislinami, ki lase okrepi in jim v...

ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, CETEARETH-20, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, OLEYL ALCOHOL, POTASSIUM OLEATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, AMMONIUM HYDROXIDE, OLETH-10, SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, PERSEA GRATISSIMA OIL, 1-HYDROXYETHYL 4,5-DIAMINO PYRAZOLE SULFATE, SILICA, 2-METHYL-5-HYDROXYETHYLAMINOPHENOL, SODIUM SULFITE, ASCORBIC ACID, PARFUM, 4-AMINO-2-HYDROXYTOLUENE, TOLUENE-2,5-DIAMINE SULFATE, TETRASODIUM EDTA, p-AMINOPHENOL, m-AMINOPHENOL, 2-AMINO-4-HYDROXYETHYLAMINOANISOLE SULFATE.

title: NEGOVALNA BARVNA KREMA 78 VULKANSKO RDEČA, SUBRINA CHARM, 50ML
